ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: This package is a collection of supervised discretization algorithms. It can also be grouped in terms of top-down or bottom-up, implementing the discretization algorithms.
This package is a collection of supervised discretization algorithms. It can also be grouped in terms of top-down or bottom-up, implementing the discretization algorithms.

name: r-discretization
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.0-1.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-discretization
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/discretization_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/discretization/discretization_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: f3ce4851e1c1e388cafd5b195c8bb833cfcab13e691984066b23fe1c33887d4a

build:
  number: 4
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('discretization')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('discretization')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=discretization
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: This package is a collection of supervised discretization algorithms. It can also be grouped in terms of top-down or bottom-up, implementing the discretization algorithms.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: discretization
# Type: Package
# Title: Data preprocessing, discretization for classification.
# Version: 1.0-1
# Date: 2010-12-02
# Author: HyunJi Kim
# Maintainer: HyunJi Kim <polaris7867@gmail.com>
# Description: This package is a collection of supervised discretization algorithms. It can also be grouped in terms of top-down or bottom-up, implementing the discretization algorithms.
# License: GPL
# LazyLoad: yes
# Packaged: 2012-10-29 08:58:35 UTC; ripley
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2012-10-29 08:58:35
